snippet: Everyone knows NATO forces are fighting the Taliban but it was rare to see it in such a straightforward way as in Helmand Province.
abstract: Everyone knows NATO forces are fighting the Taliban but it was rare to see it in such a straightforward way as in Helmand Province.
lead_paragraph: Joel van Houdt is a Dutch photographer who shot the photographs for the magazine's cover story on Afghanistan.How did you approach the project? Did you know you wanted to do portraits, or did you go in with a looser idea?

headline.main: Q. & A. with Joel van Houdt, Afghanistan-Based Photographer
